meanings.definition: To use a hoe to cultivate or weed a garden.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys hoeing the garden on sunny days.
meanings.sent2: My grandfather spends hours hoeing the soil in his backyard.
meanings.sent3: The farmer was hoeing the garden so vigorously, he almost tripped over a stray chicken.
meanings.sent4: As she was hoeing the garden, she unearthed a hidden treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic sound of hoeing in the garden was oddly soothing.

meanings.definition: The act of using a hoe to work the soil.
meanings.sent1: After a long day of hoeing, his hands were covered in blisters.
meanings.sent2: The farmer's hoeing improved the quality of the soil.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the fastest hoeing contest was intense.
meanings.sent4: The precision of his hoeing technique was admired by all.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic motion of hoeing put him in a meditative state.

meanings.definition: The process of removing weeds or cultivating soil with a hoe.
meanings.sent1: Her hoeing of the garden kept the weeds at bay.
meanings.sent2: The efficiency of his hoeing saved him hours of work.
meanings.sent3: The toddler tried to help with the hoeing but ended up making a mess.
meanings.sent4: The community garden thrived thanks to the regular hoeing by volunteers.
meanings.sent5: The satisfying crunch of hoeing through the soil was therapeutic.
